about_the_game:
Experience Unparalleled Immersion with the Next-Generation ATC Simulator. Introducing the latest evolution in air traffic control simulation—Tower! Simulator 3.

Immerse yourself in an ultra-realistic environment that brings the thrill and challenges of air traffic control right to your fingertips. With our brand-new lighting system based on real-world parameters and an intuitive 2D graphical user interface (GUI), Tower! Simulator 3 sets a new gold standard in ATC simulation.

Key Features

- Advanced Voice Recognition: Communicate with pilots using state-of-the-art voice recognition technology for an authentic ATC experience.

- Realistic Pilot Voices: Featuring lifelike pilot communications provided by the Acapela Group.

- Intuitive 2D GUI: Our newly designed 2D interface offers seamless navigation and control, making it easier than ever to manage air traffic.

- Cutting-Edge Realistic Lighting: Experience dynamic lighting simulated in real-time, utilizing technology used by movie studios for cinematic fidelity.

- Customizable Experience: Tailor your simulation with adjustable radars, schedules, data strips, and aircraft characteristics.

- 3D Tower View: Step into a fully modeled 3D control tower and watch planes take off and land as if you were really there.

- Expanded Airport Selection: Now featuring 9 detailed airports, including the newly added VRMM and VIDP. Each airport is meticulously modeled using data from OpenStreetMap for unprecedented detail.

- Multi-Monitor Support: Enhance your simulation experience with support for multiple monitors.

- Professional Training Tool: Used by real-world air traffic controllers for training purposes.

Detailed Real-World Locations

Leveraging OpenStreetMap data, Tower! Simulator 3 models surrounding areas with exceptional accuracy. Our new lighting system, based on real-world parameters, delivers the most authentic visual experience in ATC simulation history.

Expanded Airport List

Our base game now includes 9 highly detailed airports:

  • TIST (Cyril E. King Airport)

  • KLGA (LaGuardia Airport)

  • KLAX (Los Angeles International Airport)

  • KRDU (Raleigh-Durham International Airport)

  • TXKF (L.F. Wade International Airport)

  • EDDS (Stuttgart Airport)

  • KBUR (Hollywood Burbank Airport)

  • VRMM (Velana International Airport)

  • VIDP (Indira Gandhi International Airport)

Enhanced Radar, Terrain, and Strips

The terrain features 16 times more detail than before, keeping visuals sharp even at close range. The updated ground radar offers a modern look and feel, and the digital strips are fully customizable to suit your preferences.

Dynamic Lighting

Our new lighting system calculates lighting in real-time, adapting to changes in game state, time of day, and environmental conditions. Developed in collaboration with film visual effects professionals, this feature brings cinematic-quality lighting to your simulation experience.

Customization and Modding

We’ve opened up extensive customization options:

- Electronic Strips: Customize the digital strips for each airport, including layout and background images.

- Airline Liveries: Configure and assign special airline liveries, flight types, and even the country of origin.

- Terminal Assignments: Define terminals based on airline, flight type, or custom criteria.

Built for Professionals and Enthusiasts Alike

Whether you're an aviation enthusiast, an ATC student, or a professional controller, Tower! Simulator 3 offers a platform that meets your needs. Use voice commands to communicate with pilots and manage air traffic with the same tools used in professional training environments.

Join the Next Generation of ATC Simulation

Tower! Simulator 3 isn't just a game; it's a comprehensive simulation platform designed to deliver an unparalleled ATC experience. From the newly added VRMM airport to our groundbreaking lighting system and intuitive 2D GUI, every feature is crafted to provide realism and immersion like never before.

Get ready to take control of the skies!

name: Tower! Simulator 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 bit Windows 8.1, Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 bit Windows 8.1, Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires keyboard and microphone / headset

reviews:
“Tower Simulator 3 is one of those games that make you feel like you put in an honest day’s work. Challenging, fun and frustrating all at the same time.”
10 – Sky Blue Radio
short_description: Immerse yourself in an ultra-realistic environment that brings the challenges of air traffic control right to your fingertips. With brand-new lighting system, intuitive 2D graphical user interface (GUI), improved voice recognition, 9 airports included, Tower! Sim 3 sets a new gold standard.
